title: How to create a battery report on Windows 11 to learn more about it
content:
Watching the battery level on our devices is something many of us do instinctively. We always want to make sure we have enough power to get through the day, or through a specific portion of time when we can’t get to our chargers. But if you’ve tried to look at the battery indicator on your

The post How to create a battery report on Windows 11 to learn more about it appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Creating a battery report in Windows 11 is a great way to learn how well your laptop's battery is doing. Here's how to do it.
